oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Ray Stevens interview - Joe Suglia - 1977-07-01 - WBUK
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of an interview with Ray Stevens (performer), conducted by Joe Suglia from July 1, 1977 on radio station WBUK.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Ray Stevens promotes radio station WBUK -- Joe Suglia introduces Ray Stevens -- Ray Stevens talks about his new single Dixie Hummingbird -- Stevens says he likes the song -- Stevens says he doesn't know what his favorite song of his is -- Stevens messes with Suglia -- Stevens talks about interviewing with Ralph Emery -- Stevens introduces Sonny James -- Stevens tells a story about flying in a plane with a chicken -- Stevens does a Jimmy Stewart impersonation -- Stevens promotes Joe Suglia and WBUK
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Stevens, Ray, 1939-;
